main event: A civilian witnessed an unidentified flying object emitting an intense light over Springfield, Ohio, on April 5, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as orange or red and moved in an erratic zigzag pattern., The sighting lasted approximately 5 to 10 minutes., It was reported to the police department prior to notifying Project Blue Book., The investigation concluded that the brightness might have been caused by the planet Venus visible in the western sky., Witnesses had reported seeing similar objects in the area around the same time.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object emitting intense light
witness description: A civilian who reported the sighting to both police and Project Blue Book.
